spec.name: Energy Data Lost
spec.query:
from(bucket: "vue/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage")

spec.name: Power Outage
spec.query:
from(bucket: "vuegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["detailed"] == "False")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /Panel/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

spec.name: Account
Device

queries.query:
accountFilter = (tables=<-) =>
  if v.Account != "(All)" then
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["account_name"] == v.Account)
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "vuegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy_usage")
  |> accountFilter()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /Panel/ and r["device_name"] !~ /-Balance/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["detailed"] == "False"))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> group()
  |> last()

accountFilter = (tables=<-) =>
  if v.Account != "(All)" then
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["account_name"] == v.Account)
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "vuegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy_usage")
  |> accountFilter()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /Panel/ and r["device_name"] !~ /-Balance/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["detailed"] == "False"))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> group()

charts.name: Individual Device Usage over Time Period

queries.query:
accountFilter = (tables=<-) =>
  if v.Account != "(All)" then
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["account_name"] == v.Account)
  else
    tables

deviceFilter = (tables=<-) =>
  if v.Device == "(All)" then
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] !~ /Panel/)
  else
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == v.Device)

from(bucket: "vuegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy_usage")
  |> accountFilter()
  |> deviceFilter()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["detailed"] == "False" and r["device_name"] =~ /-Balance/) or (r["detailed"] == v.DetailedDataEnabled and r["device_name"] !~ /-Balance/))
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

accountFilter = (tables=<-) =>
  if v.Account != "(All)" then
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["account_name"] == v.Account)
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "vuegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy_usage")
  |> accountFilter()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /Panel/ and r["device_name"] !~ /-Balance/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["detailed"] == "False"))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value / 60000.0)}))
  |> group()
  |> sum()

accountFilter = (tables=<-) =>
  if v.Account != "(All)" then
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["account_name"] == v.Account)
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "vuegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy_usage")
  |> accountFilter()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /Panel/ and r["device_name"] !~ /-Balance/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["detailed"] == "False"))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value / 60000.0) * float(v: v.CostPerkWh)}))
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "_monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statuses")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["detailed"] == "False")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_level", as: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == "ok" then 0 else if r._value == "info" then 1 else if r._value == "warn" then 2 else 3 }))
  |> group(columns: ["_check_id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_check_name","_level","_value"])
